text:
vasU#nAM dEqva(gm) rAdhOq janA#nAM || 
uda#sya SOqcira#sthAdAq-juhvA#nasya mIqDhuSha#H | 
uddhaqmAsO# aruqShAsO# diviqspRuSaqH samaqgnimi#ndhatEq nara#H || 
agnEq vAja#syaq gOma#taq ISA#naH sahasO yahO | 
aqsmE dhE#hi jAtavEdOq mahiq Srava#H || 
sa i#dhAqnO vasu#Shkaqvi-raqgnirIqDEnyO# giqrA | 
rEqvadaqsmaBya#M purvaNIka dIdihi || 
kShaqpO rA#jannuqta tmanA&gnEq vastO#ruqtOShasa#H | 
sa ti#gmajaMBa - [  ] 14
